code: import{JOBS_RECEIVED}from"./actionTypes";import{ONCHANGE_JOBLOCATION}from"./actionTypes";import{ONCHANGE_USERLOCATION}from"./actionTypes";import{ONCHANGE_SKILLS}from"./actionTypes";import{ONCHANGE_ALLSKILLS}from"./actionTypes";import{GET_FILTERS}from"./actionTypes";import{JOB_RECEIVED}from"./actionTypes";import{SAVEDJOBS_RECEIVED}from"./actionTypes";export var fetchJobs=function fetchJobs(jobs){return{type:JOBS_RECEIVED,payload:jobs};};export var jobLocation=function jobLocation(location){return{type:ONCHANGE_JOBLOCATION,payload:location};};export var userLocation=function userLocation(location){return{type:ONCHANGE_USERLOCATION,payload:location};};export var jobSkill=function jobSkill(skill){return{type:ONCHANGE_SKILLS,payload:skill};};export var getAllSkills=function getAllSkills(skills){return{type:ONCHANGE_ALLSKILLS,payload:skills};};export var getFilters=function getFilters(filters){return{type:GET_FILTERS,payload:filters};};export var fetchJob=function fetchJob(job){return{type:JOB_RECEIVED,payload:job};};export var fetchSavedJobs=function fetchSavedJobs(savedJobs){return{type:SAVEDJOBS_RECEIVED,payload:savedJobs};};export default fetchJobs;
